price: 8. U degdegaya dhinaca baaqaha, gaaladu waxay odhan: Kani waa Maalin daran.
arabic: مُّهۡطِعِينَ إِلَى ٱلدَّاعِۖ يَقُولُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ هَٰذَا يَوۡمٌ عَسِرٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: muh'ṭiʿīna ilā al-dāʿi yaqūlu al-kāfirūna hādhā yawmun ʿasirun
